page.title: 08Stirton Mill's year
page.content: Our farm year starts in Spring. {SPRING}Sow barley,peas,turnips and kale.Plant potatoes.Turn cattle out. Market fat cattle.Spray crops for disease and bugs.Fertilise crops.1st cut of silage. {SUMMER}Blood test cattle for Brucellosis.Tidy steading.Take holidays.Rogue and certify potatoes. Combine barley and wheat.Combine peas. Bale straw.Calf cows.2nd cut of silage. {AUTUMN}Lift potatoes into boxes.Plough land ready for wheat.Sow wheat.Dress, potatoes.House cattle.Calf cows.Sell cattle. {WINTER}Plough.Dress potatoes for seed or English growers.Pull turnips.Feed cattle on silage,turnips and brock potatoes.
